meanings.definition: A person who creates or studies palindromes.
meanings.sent1: Palindromists enjoy crafting words that read the same backward and forward.
meanings.sent2: Many palindromists spend hours perfecting their palindrome creations.
meanings.sent3: The palindromists at the competition amazed the audience with their wordplay skills.
meanings.sent4: In a world of language, palindromists are the architects of symmetrical sentences.
meanings.sent5: The community of palindromists is a tight-knit group passionate about linguistic puzzles.
